      • searchContactByName

        public java.util.List<Contact> searchContactByName(java.lang.String contactName)
        Search for a contact. Only matches contacts who have a name that exactly matches {link #contactName}

        E.g. `Mike` would match `Josh Mike`, `Mike Smith`, but not `Mikey Smithson`

        Parameters:
        contactName - Name to search for
        Returns:
        A list of possible matches

      • searchContactByName

        public static java.util.List<Contact> searchContactByName(android.content.Context context,
                                                          java.lang.String contactName)
        Search for a contact. Only matches contacts who have a name that exactly matches {link #contactName}

        E.g. `Mike` would match `Josh Mike`, `Mike Smith`, but not `Mikey Smithson`

        Parameters:
        context - Context from which to get the Context Resolver
        contactName - Name to search for
        Returns:
        A list of possible matches
